Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hotel Bonanno in Pisa, you'll be minutes from Piazza del Duomo and Leaning Tower. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cathedral of St. Ranieri and Museo delle Sinopie.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 guestrooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes, and cribs/infant beds can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Grand Hotel Bonanno in Pisa, you'll be minutes from Piazza del Duomo and Leaning Tower. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cathedral of St. Ranieri and Museo delle Sinopie.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piazza del Duomo - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cathedral of St. Ranieri - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museo delle Sinopie - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza dei Miracoli - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Orto Botanico di Pisa - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Camposanto - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Pisa Baptistry - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Cittadella Vecchia - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
University Hospital of Santa Chiara - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Pisa Arsenal - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Leaning Tower - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Cathedral of Pisa - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Church of San Nicola - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Palazzo delle Vedove - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Church of San Paolo a Ripa d'Arno - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Bonanno is Pisa (PSA-Galileo Galilei) - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
